site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London
description: Application pursuant to Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act for non-material amendments to reserved matters approval for Plot 14 (reference 20/5690/RMA dated 10/03/2021, as amended by 23/1877/NMA dated 28/06/2023, 23/5029/NMA dated 19/01/2024, 23/1877/NMA dated 28/06/2023, and 23/5439/NMA dated 08/04/2024 pursuant to Section 73 planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23 July 2014 for the redevelopment of the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Scheme. The application seeks to make changes to the facades including: the addition of a pergola structure to Neighbourhood Square retail fa√ßade along North-East Elevationshopfront alteration on north-east elevation replacement of flat concrete above window openings with Reckli on Courtyard North-West and South-West elevationsremoval of Juliet balcony on GF terrace door to allow accesslouvre detailing on rooftop plant enclosuresremoval of Juliet balconies from Block A lift lobby windows (on Proposed Courtyard North-East Elevation) to facilitate the operation of automatic opening vents pursuant to the fire strategy.minor changes to level 01 door openings to achieve Part M requirements on Courtyard South West elevation addition of 1no. louvre at ground floor of Courtyard North-West elevation to provide ventilationomission of ground floor door on Courtyard North-West elevationThe application also proposes an alteration to the apartment layouts at first floor; removal of structure at 1st floor; increase in height of lift overrun.The application also seeks to introduce Use Class A4 for the ground floor retail units with a consequential update to the description of development.
